title: Installation issue : stat@4.0.1
body:
I have been trying to install the stat in ubuntu docker image: 
```
Linux bf90d55a57db 4.15.0-66-generic #75-Ubuntu SMP Tue Oct 1 05:24:09 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
The command used for installation was

```console
$ spack install stat@4.0.1 
```
and I have been getting the following error.
```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

4 errors found in build log:
     279    STAT_FrontEnd.C: In member function 'bool STAT_FrontEnd::checkNodeAccess(char*)':
     280    STAT_FrontEnd.C:4708:10: warning: ignoring return value of 'char* fgets(char*, int, FILE*)', declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     281         fgets(testOutput, sizeof(testOutput), output);
     282         ~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     283    libtool: link: require no space between `-L' and `-Wl,-rpath='
     284    Makefile:800: recipe for target '_STATmerge.la' failed
  >> 285    make[3]: *** [_STATmerge.la] Error 1
     286    make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     287    mv -f .deps/STAT_FilterDefinitions_la-STAT_FilterDefinitions.Tpo .deps/STAT_FilterDefinitions_la-STAT_FilterDefinitions.Plo
     288    MRNetSymbolReader.C: In member function 'virtual Dyninst::SymReader* MRNetSymbolReaderFactory::openSymbolReader(std::__cxx11::string)':
     289    MRNetSymbolReader.C:141:18: warning: ignoring return value of 'size_t fread(void*, size_t, size_t, FILE*)', declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-resu
            lt]
     290                 fread(fileContents, size, 1, fp);
     291                 ~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

     ...

     516    /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/stdio2.h:65:44: note: '__builtin___snprintf_chk' output between 4 and 8205 bytes into a destination of size 8192
     517            __bos (__s), __fmt, __va_arg_pack ());
     518                                                ^
     519    mv -f .deps/libstatbe_la-STAT_BackEnd.Tpo .deps/libstatbe_la-STAT_BackEnd.Plo
     520    make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src/src'
     521    Makefile:1158: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 522    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     523    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src/src'
     524    Makefile:540: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 525    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     526    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src'
     527    Makefile:450: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 528    make: *** [all] Error 2
```

I tried rebuilding in using `spack -d install -j 1 stat@4.0.1`
Then i get the errors as follows:
```
  >> 379    make[3]: *** [libstatfe.la] Error 1
     380    make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src/src'
     381    Makefile:1158: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 382    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     383    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src/src'
     384    Makefile:540: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 385    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     386    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-stat-4.0.1-crehm3eawh7tslua26m7bzn6qn7vj4eu/spack-src'
     387    Makefile:450: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 388    make: *** [all] Error 2
```
`spack spec --install-status stat@4.0.1` gives the following:
